title: New Cinematic/animation
body:
Just had a thought about a new cinematic/animation. Its nothing special and probably has been thought of. But how cool would it be to see/watch a 1st person view of different characters. And could also make a game of it where you have to guess each one. I know it would take some time and effort to do, but have to admit it would be pretty cool :D. 
Thanks for Reading :D

replies.body: If they made one, a stealth champion would probably work best. Something like a Teemo's eye view of him sneaking around being a constant thorn in the side to the people trying to squish the little rat.
